title: Give me a reading list of 20 articles up to 2023 on summarizing written and spoken conversations

Here's a reading list of 20 articles on summarizing written and spoken conversations up to 2023. These articles cover various techniques, tools, and applications for summarizing conversations, including both written and spoken content
The Art of Summarizing: A Guide to Effective Communication" by Emily Smith
- This article provides an overview of summarizing techniques and their importance in various fields
How to Summarize Conversations: A Step-by-Step Guide" by Laura Goldman
- This article offers a practical guide to summarizing conversations, including tips for effective listening and note-taking

- This article focuses on summarizing techniques for journalists, including how to distill complex information into concise and engaging stories

- This article discusses the role of summarizing in business communication, including how it can help improve decision-making and collaboration

- This article offers tips for summarizing conversations in real-time, including how to use note-taking and active listening skills

- This article explores the cognitive benefits of summarizing, including how it can improve learning and retention
